mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (id, grade_code, cus_id, cus_pw, name, nickname, gender, birth_date, phone, email, is_del) VALUES (#{cus_id}, #{cus_pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{birth_date}, #{phone}, #{email}, "0")
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customer WHERE cus_id = #{cus_id} AND cus_pw = #{cus_pw}
